title: Angel's Naughty Cheesecake
ingredients: ['1 handful macadamia nuts (optional but recommended!)', '2 packs triple chocolate cookies', '50g butter, melted', '350g full fat cream cheese', '450ml double cream, divided', '55g caster sugar', "1 large bar Green & Black's Creamy Milk Chocolate", '2 large bars milk chocolate', '1 Large bar white chocolate', '1 handful milk chocolate chips', '3 tablespoons Baileys']
